import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/custom-button.component' import { addItem } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import { CollectionItemContainer, AddButton, BackgroundImage, CollectionFooterContainer, NameContainer, PriceContainer } from './collection-item.styles' const CollectionItem = ({ item, addItem}) => { const { name, price, imageUrl } = item return

{name}

{price}

addItem(item)} inverted>Add to cart } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ addItem: item => dispatch(addItem(item)) }) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CollectionItem)
